tool_description: Checks availability windows for comedy venues and retrieves booking requirements, capacity limits, and scheduling constraints.

venue_names.description: List of venue names to check availability for

preferred_dates.description: Preferred performance dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

flexible_dates.description: Whether to suggest alternative dates if preferred dates unavailable

error_messages: Invalid venue names: One or more venue names in the list were not found in the booking system.
Invalid date format: All dates in preferred_dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and in the future.
Invalid show type: show_type must be one of 'open_mic', 'feature', or 'headline'.
Booking system unavailable: Unable to connect to venue booking systems at this time.
usage: Provide lists of venue names and preferred dates to check availability. Specify show_type for accurate booking requirements and set flexible_dates for alternative suggestions.

booking_requirements.description: Specific requirements for each available slot

alternative_dates.description: Suggested alternative dates if preferred dates unavailable

capacity_limits.description: Maximum audience capacity for each venue
